Experience.title: Founder
description: Founded DSC YU to empower students in cybersecurity through firsthand training and mentorship.
Organized workshops on ethical hacking, penetration testing, and digital forensics.
Led efforts to foster digital safety and a secure university environment.

Experience.title: Technical Support Associate
Experience.company: The Computer Center of Yarmouk University
description: Developed and maintained university websites, electronic services, and computer information systems while managing and updating main server devices and data storage units.
Provided technical support at Yarmouk University's Computer and Information Center, resolving hardware and software issues for users.
Ensured smooth operation of systems and servers, assisting in the upkeep and enhancement of electronic services and storage infrastructure.
